properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl openjdk-7-jre-headless="$JAVA_VERSION"* unzip wget

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: curl -SL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL" -o tomcat.tar.gz 	&& curl -SL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL.asc" -o tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& gpg --verify tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& tar -xvf tomcat.tar.gz --strip-components=1 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomcat.tar.gz*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl openjdk-7-jre-headless="$JAVA_VERSION"* unzip wget

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: curl -SL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL" -o tomcat.tar.gz 	&& curl -SL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL.asc" -o tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& gpg --verify tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& tar -xvf tomcat.tar.gz --strip-components=1 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomcat.tar.gz*
